In addition to enjoying global proximity by flight distance of 2-3 hours from European and Gulf countries.

about.subtitle: The Real Mediterranean
about.tagline: A New Global Destination Rising on the Mediterranean
about.p1: An internationally designed fully integrated development spanning over an area of 23 million square meters of land.
about.p2: Nestled in a very prime location on the Southern Mediterranean at the opulent Egyptian North Coast shoreline, SouthMED is perfectly situated at Kilo 165 on the Alexandria-Matrouh Road, offering easy accessibility. In addition to enjoying global proximity by flight distance of 2-5 hours from European and Gulf countries. For added convenience, the Al Alamien International Airport is just an 18-minute drive away, ensuring seamless travel connections for residents and visitors alike.

hero.title: About us
hero.description: Whether you're interested in learning more about our iconic developments, exploring residential or commercial investment opportunities, or have specific questions about one of our communities, we’re here to help.

tmg.title: Talaat Moustafa Group
tmg.p1: Talaat Moustafa Group, a leading Egyptian real estate developer, boasts a remarkable track record. TMG's integrated communities offer self-sufficient, modern housing for over a million residents, situated within environmentally-green cities, plus upscale hotels and resorts that have reshaped Egypt's urban and tourism landscapes. Its unprecedented development philosophy has redefined modern living and contributed to Egypt's growth.
tmg.p2: Driven by a sharp vision and a unique philosophy, TMG has shaped the urban landscape by developing insignificant, self-sustained cities & communities, and an array of residential, commercial, and hospitality projects nationwide. TMG excels at creating a unique template for community living and is dedicated to maintaining the highest quality of standards while continually striving to lead a new future-proof way of life with people at its core.
tmg.p3: TMG's portfolio is filled with a plethora of noteworthy projects, being the developer of 'Al Rehab city' in New Cairo, which represented a revolution in the outskirts living concept, followed by the flagship mega-project 'Madinaty' developed over 8000 feddans to introduce a new approach of life integration with international standards, and the unique project in the heart of the new capital 'Celia'.

portfolio.title: Strong Portfolio Presentation
portfolio.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

timeline.heading: Years of Achievement
timeline.slideDescription: In the southern Mediterranean in partnership with the Egyptian government with investments amounting to one trillion pounds, equivalent to about 21 billion dollars, which will represent a turning point in the history of the life of the largest real estate developer on the local and regional scene, as it is a new global destination that rivals the most luxurious and upscale global destinations located in the northern Mediterranean, such as the beaches and cities of southern France, Italy, Spain and Greece

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: TMG Is Committed To Create A Distinctive Lifestyle For Modern Communities And Tourism Destinations In Egypt And Overseas, Providing Employees With Opportunities To Contribute To The Development And Success Of Our Communities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Tmg Aspires To Become The Customers First Choice In The Real-Estate And Tourism Industries Nationally And Globally, Providing Our Clients A Great Quality Of Life. While Maintaining A Long-Term Relation With Our Shareholders Believing That They Are Our Partners Of Success, Providing Them A Rapid Investments Growth.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: We operate with unwavering integrity and credibility, ensuring transparency and trust in all our relationships. Our commitment to quality drives us to deliver excellence across every project and service. With a strong customer-first mindset, we listen, respond, and tailor solutions that meet real needs.
